#summary Installing and compiling
#labels setup,HowTo

=Requirements=
  * Lemur toolkit [http://sourceforge.net/projects/lemur/]

=Installing=
  # download and extract EARS
  # open `Makefile` and set the value of the `Lemur_dir` variable according to your local settings
  # under linux: type `make` in the EARS directory

=(Re)compiling=
  # type `make clean`
  # type `make`
